example.mysports
Class LeagueRepository

java.lang.Object
  example.mysports.LeagueRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LeagueRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

MySports Domain Model Repository providing simplified persistence facade for managing the application bootstrapped EntityManagerFactory that are tenant aware.

Since:
EclipseLink 2.3.0
Author:
dclarke
See Also:

public java.util.List<javax.persistence.metamodel.Attribute<?,?>> getAdditionalAttributes(java.lang.Class<?> entityType)

unwrap

public <T> T unwrap(java.lang.Class<T> cls)
Provide access to internals of repository similar to EntityManager.unwrap(Class). Provided for access to advanced capabilities of the underlying EclipseLink persistence unit as well as for testing access to internals.
